description: Position of the first occurrence of n in continued fraction for Champernowne constant (A030167).
comments: Only 187 terms of the sequence are known. The position of 188 is > 82328. - _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jun 29 2013
links: John K. Sikora and Eric W. Weisstein, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..187 (terms n = 1..112 from John K. Sikora)
author: _Hans Havermann_, May 01 2000
